children.html: ELECTRAVOLT

children.text: Hello, we've prepared your energy bill

children.html:
Please pay {$data.data.payments_breakdown.total_payment:currency;USD;0;2} until {$data.data.payments_breakdown.payment_due}
Thank you!

children.text: You can find 4 simple ways to pay on the bottom of the page.
This id based on 10 similar homes an average of 6 mi from you. Efficient homes are the most efficient 20% of this group.
How to use your AC efficiently
Set your thermostat to a constant temperature, such as 78  F. When you  leave, turn off your AC or rise the temperature 7-10 degrees.

children.html:
When paying you need your customer reference number which is {$data.data.billing_details.customer_reference_number}
Please allow 3 working days for your payment to clear at bank or Post Office and 5 working days if you pay by post.
Login to your account at accounts.electravolt.com to pay this bill, purchase power and monitor your usage.
Go to electravolt.com/directdebit to setup or update a direct debit from your bank or credit card account.
Using our app to pay this bill. Download at electravolt.com/app
Pay your bill with your credit card, security and without a fee at electravolt.com/creditcard. We accept Visa, American Express and Mastercard.
